These instructions SHOULD work as they worked for me. 

My ME2 folder "C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Desktop\Masseffect 2".
Downloaded and installed these mods,following their instructions.
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5312494/Mass_Effect_2_DLC_Pack_%5BPC___Multi6%5D
and
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5484229/Mass_Effect_2_DLC_-_Kasumi_Stolen_Memory
1.Before you can install YOU NEED TO TURN OFF gameplay feedback and autoconnect.Do so by starting Mass Effect 2 and going to extras > Options.
Then exit game.
2.Run the DLC installers (IT SHOULD AUTO FIND YOUR FOLDER,if it doesn't I'm sorry but i cant give u any advice, just make sure you put it in the same directory as me)
3.Copy "giveme2entitlements.exe" to ME2 Folder and Run it.
4.You should be able play with the DLC installed
